faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Chequi

items.question: Do I need to install any app?
items.answer: No. Chequi works entirely in the web browser, for both administrators and scanners. You just need internet access and a smartphone or computer with a camera to scan QR codes.

items.question: Does it work without internet connection?
items.answer: Yes. The scanner module has offline mode that stores scans locally and syncs them automatically when you regain connection. Ideal for events in places with limited connectivity.

items.question: How many devices can I connect simultaneously?
items.answer: Unlimited. You can have as many control points as you need, all synced in real time. Each device can work independently and data is consolidated in the central dashboard.

items.question: Are QR codes secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. Each QR code is unique and non-transferable, generated with a 128-bit random token. Additionally, the system validates in real time and detects reuse or duplication attempts.

items.question: Can I customize tickets?
items.answer: Yes. You can fully customize ticket design: add your logo, change colors, select fonts, adjust sizes and element positions. It also supports custom background images.

items.question: Is there an attendee limit?
items.answer: There is no technical limit. Chequi scales from small 10-person events to mega events with over 50,000 attendees without performance degradation.

items.question: What reports are included?
items.answer: Excel export with 5 sheets: list of all attendees, scans per attendee, hourly activity, summary by category, and detailed usage analysis. It also includes real-time dashboard charts.

items.question: What is the technical support like?
items.answer: We offer email support with response in less than 24 hours. For enterprise clients, there are priority support options and live event technical assistance.

items.question: Can I import my attendee list?
items.answer: Yes. You can import complete lists from Excel files (.xlsx) with columns for name, email, category, and other data. The system automatically assigns tickets and generates QR codes.

items.question: What if I need to make last-minute changes?
items.answer: You can add, edit, or delete attendees at any time before and during the event. Changes are reflected instantly on all connected devices.
